name: DICE QUEST (George Games Studio)
description:
!!!HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO DOWNLOAD WINDOWS VERSION!!!

DICE QUEST is a deck-building, turn-based roguelite where you use dice to control your character. Get through dungeon, collect dices to destroy your enemies and have fun.

(pro tip: if you have already maxed hp/armor and throw dice you can permanently increase them, so you can plan for upcoming areas)

game created for GMTK JAM 2022    Theme: Roll of the dice

This game was created in 48 hours and is far from what i wanted. I'm planning to continue on this game. If you have some ideas please feel free to leave a comment ;)

to see devlogs and more stuff please

You can follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GGS_official_1
